description: ff. 31. 277 x 198; 202 x 120 mm. 21 lin. 19th cen. Anonymous biographies of Aḥmad al-Rifāʻī, ʻAbd al-Qādir al-Jīlānī, Aḥmad al-Badawī, and Ibrāhīm al-Dusūqī. Incip.: ... الحمد لله وکفى ... اما بعد فان محبة الاولىاء الکرام
title: Taʻṭīr al-maḥādir fī akhbār al-aqṭāb al-arbaʻah al-akābir
subject: Sufis—Biography
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
